title: Bits & Bytes: Meta beats lawsuit over Apple privacy
description: In a decision, US District Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers also rejected claims that Meta concealed former COO Sheryl Sandberg’s use of company resources on personal matters, including her wedding and her book Lean In.
content: Meta Platforms won the dismissal of a lawsuit claiming it defrauded shareholders by concealing how changes to Apple’s privacy settings would make Facebook and Instagram less desirable for advertisers.In a decision, US District Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers also rejected claims that Meta concealed former COO Sheryl Sandberg’s use of company resources on personal matters, including her wedding and her book Lean In.The Oakland, California-based judge also turned aside claims that Meta knew its transition to Reels, which copied TikTok’s short-form video format, would hurt revenue because it offered fewer ads per hour than older formats.Tech firms blast EU decisions on AIA group of companies including Meta and Spotify blasted the European Union for its “fragmented and inconsistent” decision-making on data privacy and artificial intelligence (AI). The firms along with several researchers and industry bodies signed an open letter claiming that Europe was already becoming less competitive and risked falling further behind in the age of AI.
